item2: Marketing expenses three months ended September 30, 2025 $202.9, increase $17.1 9.2% compared same period 2024. Marketing expenses percentage net sales third quarter 2025 increased 50 bps 12.8% compared 12.3% same period 2024 due 110 bps higher expense invest brands drive market share growth support new products, offset 60 bps leverage higher net sales. Marketing expenses nine months ended September 30, 2025 $496.6, increase $6.4 1.3% compared same period 2024. Marketing expenses percentage net sales first nine months 2025 increased 10 bps 10.9% compared 10.8% same period 2024 due 20 bps higher expense, invest brands drive market share growth support new products, offset 10 bps leverage higher net sales.
